## Request Information

**Dimensions**
Size of the painting in blocks [i.e. 1x1, 3x2]

**Theme / Subject**
What do you want the painting to look like or be of?  Be specific!  The more detail you can give me, the better. If you have references, please attach them to this ticket. 

**Color Palette**
What color scheme or aesthetic do you want? If you have references, please attach them to this ticket. [i.e.  Pastels, sepia, grayscale. etc.]  

**Additional Information**
Add any other context or screenshots related to the painting request here.
